snippet.title: Double Vampiric Gloves Thornwhip | Backpack Battles
snippet.description:
Thornwhip Poison Ivy the classic combo. The thing I realized playing this run was that the Bloodthorne is not always better than just a regular Thornwhip. If you happen to have no health regeneration in your build whatsoever and don't plan on getting any, it might be better for you to just stick with the good old Thornwhip.

Backpack Battles on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2427700/Backpack_Battles/
Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=iGm2T2GEZDI&list=OLAK5uy_lTNOYHC3_y87WTMZQSPuZNFw55zie9c4c

---

Website: https://asimpletouch.org/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/asimpIetouch
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/asimpletouch

---

myTags: class:ranger, patch:0.7.2

snippet.title: I hate spike builds | Backpack Battles
snippet.description:
Ripsaw Blade is too good. Three gem slots? wtf were they thinking. It's not even that rare of an item either. Great against spike, Hungry Blade, and Bloodthorne builds. The developers really have got to add some other way of negating all these spike builds infesting the ladder these days. It would really open up the number of potential builds.

Backpack Battles on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2427700/Backpack_Battles/
Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_zjA_u0tx5A&list=OLAK5uy_lwb5uPR4BotrPNa0B2e1hZvuwX8hAgayw

---

snippet.title: Five Spike Shields Bloodthorne | Backpack Battles
snippet.description:
You've got spikes that do damage when opponents attack you, but your Spike Shields are removing stamina when opponents attack you, thus opponents cannot attack you. Will this build work? idk lets find out.

snippet.title: The classic spikes Poison Ivy | Backpack Battles
snippet.description:
Nothing can stop the spikes builds, except maybe the Ripsaw Blade, and Bow and Arrow crit builds. But nobody ever goes for the Ripsaw Blade, and to deal with Bow and Arrow just pick up one or two Cap of Resiliences and you'll be fine. The developers should really add more ways of dealing with spikes.

myTags: class:ranger, patch:0.7.2

snippet.title: New item Magic Torch | Backpack Battles
snippet.description:
One of the main complaints I had with this game was that the opening rounds for the Ranger were so boring and predictable. You pretty much had to go for whetstones into upgraded hero swords. Thankfully these last few patches the developers have added more recipes involving the wooden swords thus leading to more interesting and fun situations. Now you can decide to go Hero Sword or Torch the latter of which has gotten a new recipe Magic Torch. Lets see how good it is then.

Backpack Battles on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2427700/Backpack_Battles/
Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BFwubQE8xUM&list=OLAK5uy_n1EtqzsfKy_KLcfXsNi5DGo8tCNug1RwY

---

Twitter: https://twitter.com/asimpIetouch
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/asimpletouch

myTags: class:ranger, patch:0.7.2

snippet.title: Cards on a Ranger? New Present unique item | Backpack Battles
snippet.description:
New patch, new Christmas themed unique items. The game is just getting better and better with each new patch introducing new items more and more builds are possible. I have never played with the Reaper class and am completely unfamiliar with Reaper item builds. But now I am forced to learn on the spot since the new unique Christmas Present item gifts Ranger only players with Reaper only items :). This is a great item. It introduces an incredibly fun mechanic that I thought this game needed to have from the start. The ability to play with items locked behind other classes.

Backpack Battles on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2427700/Backpack_Battles/

---

Website: https://asimpletouch.org/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/asimpIetouch
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/asimpletouch

---

myTags: class:ranger, patch:0.7.1

snippet.title: Spikes are very consistent | Backpack Battles
snippet.description:
New patch, new Christmas themed unique items. But let me just ignore all that and go for a spike build again. These Corrupted Crystal's are such value items when going for a Spike Poison Ivy build, they generate ~30 armor EACH at a minimum. They're just better Stone Skin potions since they have a higher cap on total armor generation and are easier to trigger.

snippet.title: Complete Noob Plays Civilization V | First Game in a Decade EP9
snippet.description:
A complete Civilization noob tries to win their first game of Civilization 5.
I first played this game a decade ago, had some fun with for a bit, but I recall this feeling of not knowing at all what was happening.
Now a decade later and hopefully a decade smarter I come back with a with newfound determination to finally win a game of Civilization 5.

Civilization 5 on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/8930/Sid_Meiers_Civilization_V/

snippet.title: Becoming One With Nature | Beecarbonize Hardcore
snippet.description:
A resource management tech tree game where your goal is to advance the technology of human kind while managing how your emissions.  Do you have what it takes to save the planet? Beecarbonize is an environmental card strategy game with climate change as your opponent.
